QuestData.Title: Elemental Attunement
QuestData.Description: Many shaman have sought the favor of the Throne of Elements.$b$bForming an elemental bond with the furies allows a shaman to not only know the will of the elements on Draenor, but also tap into a great font of elemental power.$b$bIf you are to discover the truth behind Gordawg's disappearance, you will need to succeed where others have failed and undertake the Ritual of Binding.$b$bFirst, you must prepare yourself. Seek out the elemental pillars upon the plateau and attune your spirit with the elements.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out the four elemental pillars.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $n.$b$bBy linking with each of the four elemental pillars you have attuned your life energy with each of the elements on Draenor.$b$bYou are now ready to undertake the Ritual of Binding.$b$bSpeak to me when your work upon the Elemental Plateau is finished, and we shall begin.
